title: PING ISSUES **RIOT HELLOOO ANYONE THERE??**
body: Riot, this is a joke.  We're in the middle of event trying to unlock rewards and running out of time.  55MS and its playing like im at 10k ping.  Please stop ignoring us and at least let us know you're looking in to it.... Silence is pretty damn frustrating.

replies.body: Folks - If you're having ISP issues you need to provide some details in your posts. ISP and location will help us pinpoint the areas you're talking about. I have done some digging and can see potential issues between Salt Lake City and Denver that may be impacting some players on Comcast. If this is you, please help us out by letting us know.

> [{quoted}](name=Korensky,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aXVxxvpa,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-04T06:11:23.647+0000)
>
> Folks - If you're having ISP issues you need to provide some details in your posts. ISP and location will help us pinpoint the areas you're talking about. I have done some digging and can see potential issues between Salt Lake City and Denver that may be impacting some players on Comcast. If this is you, please help us out by letting us know.

That is me. Live just south of Denver and am on Comcast. Normal ping and FPS but constant lag in the game. Also, other players experiencing the issue all from the CO/UT region:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/agNO68eR-solid-44-ping-lowest-ive-had-latency

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3fpeb3/ping_halved_twice_the_delay/
Thanks for getting this fixed.  I was able to play last night with no issues.  You guys rock!

KORENSKY, Thank you for the Reply.  I've been at work since and I don't know if the error is continuing at home.  However you nailed it on the head I'm in the Ogden, UT area... which would technically be the greater SLC area.
I'm having the same problem.  Servers been fuckked for the last 2 hours for me.  Must be giving priority to their pro players.  pfft.
+1 Can't believe we haven't heard anything on this yet.

I'm still experiencing this problem as of today. I live in Loveland, Colorado with Comcast ISP similar to others. Linking another thread to tie information together with the same issue.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EWYk9LB1-horrible-ping-packet-loss-weird-ping-issues-ping-inconsistencies
Maybe if your title didn't make you sound like a douchebag raging with some serious mental issues they'd answer
How do you feel now, dumb dumb.  I got an answer... And I clearly wasn't raging, just frustrated... I'm sure you've never felt that before... RIGHT?

I made this comment after the answer arrived actually.
I just wanted to remind people that beeing polite makes reds answer, sayng ***HELLOOO ANYONE THERE??*** like if reds are some sort of monkeys that make your ping go high with a lever, makes them stay away from the boards, as discussed in the feedback thread that you can easily find

By putting the title as I did it informed the Red's that  we were looking for a response and we hadn't gotten one yet(I clearly wasn't the only one looking for a response). I wasn't being impolite... Just making it a bold statement so it had the opportunity to be seen.  It was effective.  Before you go making negative comments you should assume good intent it will make you look like less of a fool for making assumptions.  If you don't like it, that's something you'll have to deal with for yourself.
No you just sound like an arrogant that way and people like you are the reason reds take some time to answer us.

You understand how stupid your logic is right?  You're posting in a thread that was responded to by a Riot member rather quickly.  I'm guessing thoughtful thinking isn't a strong suite for you.  That being said I'm done having this conversation with you.  My problem was solved... By a Riot employee and bickering with a child is getting us nowhere.  G'day.
